channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report E-2023110006
item.description:
Report E-2023110006

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: GLENPOOL
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 8 gallons of Heat flex high temp 1000 dark color (UN1263) were released from two 5-gallon metal pails due to improper loading by terminal LTU. The release impacted the inside of trailer #3119143. (1) 55 gallon DM containing two 5-gallon metal pails of Heat flex high temp 1000 dark color and Oil Dri were created as waste and was left onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

  • Description: BOX WAS FOUND LEAKING ON BOXLINE 5 TOP SLIDE, CALL WAS MADE TO DESIGNATED RESPONDER WHO CLEANED UP SPILL AND TRANSPORTED BOX TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023101510
item.description:
Report X-2023101510

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-06T09:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: OKLAHOMA CITY
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: BOX WAS FOUND ON PD 5 LOW VOLUME PICKOFF, WAS LEAKING ONTO BELT. CALL WAS MADE TO DESIGNATED RESPONDER TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. BOX WAS THEN TRANSPORTED TO THE DAMAGED MATERIALS AREA FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023100519
item.description:
Report X-2023100519

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-27
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: ARRIVED AT NOKC 732 FROM DALLAS 753 TRAILER 815955. PKG CAME OFF TRAILER DAMAGED AND WET WITH INTERNAL LEAKAGE DUE TO LOOSE CAPS AND INSUFFICIENT INNER AND OUTER PACKAGING. NO HAZ LABELS ON THE OUTSIDE OF PKG. UNDECLARED HAZMAT DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PKG AND CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A HAZ BAG AND HAZ TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023100334
item.description:
Report X-2023100334

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-30
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found in unload during OTP, leaking. Placed in tote. DescribePack: Package only contained corrugated liners for inner packaging. No lid secures or paint clips on cans. No transportation stickers. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in tote.
